## Functions

### LLVMCreateFunctionPassManager() {#ga7e63986f39ff78682a387dca7dad83c1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMPassManagerRef LLVMCreateFunctionPassManager (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad77f13d71e9aebc385324cde314d9ac6">LLVMModuleProviderRef</a> MP)</>}>
Deprecated: Use LLVMCreateFunctionPassManagerForModule instead.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l04778">4778</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l04563">4563</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.

### LLVMCreateFunctionPassManagerForModule() {#gaf677b98752f2afd5fb25906c33bc237c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMPassManagerRef LLVMCreateFunctionPassManagerForModule (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> M)</>}>
Constructs a new function-by-function pass pipeline over the module provider.

It does not take ownership of the module provider. This type of pipeline is suitable for code generation and JIT compilation tasks. 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
llvm::FunctionPassManager::FunctionPassManager
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l04775">4775</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l04559">4559</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMCreatePassManager() {#gabcb01c2a5ba65b4ebb0e4ca8b11e0920}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="LLVMPassManagerRef LLVMCreatePassManager (void)">
Constructs a new whole-module pass pipeline.

This type of pipeline is suitable for link-time optimization and whole-module transformations. 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passmanager/#a8feea6425d71b06eb9eea6dfb60dcf4e">llvm::PassManager::PassManager</a>
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMDisposePassManager() {#gabd99e3acfdfa7bcbd83772f326217189}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMDisposePassManager (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga45fccfac9832f829c5e12a8915e85f4c">LLVMPassManagerRef</a> PM)</>}>
Frees the memory of a pass pipeline.

For function pipelines, does not free the module provider. 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passmanagerbase/#a4e678f968a8f574109cb78eee4d3d756">llvm::PassManagerBase::~PassManagerBase</a>.
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMFinalizeFunctionPassManager() {#gacaac4e1b3d3f4314d4f2fabdb0de856e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMBool LLVMFinalizeFunctionPassManager (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga45fccfac9832f829c5e12a8915e85f4c">LLVMPassManagerRef</a> FPM)</>}>
Finalizes all of the function passes scheduled in the function pass manager.

Returns 1 if any of the passes modified the module, 0 otherwise. 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
llvm::FunctionPassManager::doFinalization
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l04800">4800</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l04580">4580</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.

<MemberDefinition

Initializes all of the function passes scheduled in the function pass manager.

Returns 1 if any of the passes modified the module, 0 otherwise. 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
llvm::FunctionPassManager::doInitialization
</SectionUser>

### LLVMRunFunctionPassManager() {#gacace2d072a4735931738af64cc6fc170}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMBool LLVMRunFunctionPassManager (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga45fccfac9832f829c5e12a8915e85f4c">LLVMPassManagerRef</a> FPM, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> F)</>}>
Executes all of the function passes scheduled in the function pass manager on the provided function.

Returns 1 if any of the passes modified the function, false otherwise. 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
llvm::FunctionPassManager::run(Function&amp;)
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l04795">4795</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l04576">4576</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.

### LLVMRunPassManager() {#ga59bfa857c4ed502aeed6a39bcb1cbbce}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMBool LLVMRunPassManager (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga45fccfac9832f829c5e12a8915e85f4c">LLVMPassManagerRef</a> PM, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> M)</>}>
Initializes, executes on the provided module, and finalizes all of the passes scheduled in the pass manager.

Returns 1 if any of the passes modified the module, 0 otherwise. 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
llvm::PassManager::run(Module&amp;)
</SectionUser>
